org.transitime.ipc.interfaces

Interface PredictionsInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PredictionsServer

    public interface PredictionsInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Defines the RMI interface used for obtaining predictions.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PredictionsInterface.RouteStop
      This class is for use as key into hash maps that store prediction data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> get(java.util.List<PredictionsInterface.RouteStop> routeStops, int predictionsPerStop)
      For each route/stop specified returns a list of predictions for that stop.
      java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> get(Location loc, double maxDistance, int predictionsPerStop)
      Returns predictions based on the specified location.
      java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> get(java.lang.String routeShortName, java.lang.String stopId, int predictionsPerStop)
      Returns list of current predictions for the specified route/stop.
      java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> getAllPredictions(int predictionMaxFutureSecs)
      Returns all predictions.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> get(java.lang.String routeShortName,
                                                   java.lang.String stopId,
                                                   int predictionsPerStop)
                                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns list of current predictions for the specified route/stop.
        Parameters:
        routeIdOrShortName - Can be either the GTFS route_id or the route_short_name.
        stopId -
        predictionsPerStop - Max number of predictions to return for route/stop
        Returns:
        List of PredictionsForRouteStop objects for the route/stop, one for each destination
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • get

        java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> get(java.util.List<PredictionsInterface.RouteStop> routeStops,
                                                   int predictionsPerStop)
                                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        For each route/stop specified returns a list of predictions for that stop. Since expensive RMI calls are being done this method is much more efficient for obtaining multiple predictions then if a separate get() call is done for each route/stop.
        Parameters:
        routeStops - List of route/stops to return predictions for. Uses route short name or route ID
        predictionsPerStop - Max number of predictions to return per route/stop
        Returns:
        List of PredictionsForRouteStop objects for the route/stop. There is a separate one for each destination for each route/stop.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • get

        java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> get(Location loc,
                                                   double maxDistance,
                                                   int predictionsPerStop)
                                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns predictions based on the specified location.
        Parameters:
        loc - The user's location
        maxDistance - How far a stop can be away from the loc
        predictionsPerStop -
        Returns:
        List of PredictionsForRouteStop objects for the location. There is a separate one for each destination for each route/stop.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getAllPredictions

        java.util.List<IpcPredictionsForRouteStopDest> getAllPredictions(int predictionMaxFutureSecs)
                                                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns all predictions. This is intended for clients such as the GTFS-RT vehicle update feed that outputs all predictions by trip.
        Parameters:
        predictionMaxFutureSecs -
        Returns:
        List of all PredictionsForRouteStop objects for system. There is a separate one for every route/stop/destination.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
